job_tasks.phrase: Analyze complex tickets escalated by AI systems, apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short, and then close the gap by improving the AI system
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes understanding customer issues and improving the AI system to handle them, which requires understanding the business need for customer support and how the AI contributes to it.

job_tasks.phrase: Review AI-generated solutions and provide detailed feedback and participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions
job_tasks.justification: Explicitly mentions 'AI model fine-tuning sessions', indicating direct involvement in adapting and improving AI models.
This implies modifying or enhancing the AI's performance, which falls under the umbrella of modeling.

job_tasks.phrase: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies
job_tasks.justification: Prototyping and testing new AI tools directly relates to the exploration and development of AI models and approaches.

job_tasks.phrase: Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support
job_tasks.justification: Integrating capabilities implies building or connecting systems, which is a software development task, even if focused on AI.

job_tasks.phrase: close the gap by improving the AI system
job_tasks.justification: While 'improving the AI system' can be modeling, the context of 'closing the gap' suggests integration and potentially software development to achieve this.

soft_skills.phrase: apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short
ramp up one several products within the first month (we are aware this is aggressive)
unblocking yourself, Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support, focusing on complex issues that AI cannot yet fully resolve
Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies

classification.rationale: The role emphasizes improving AI systems, fine-tuning AI models, and integrating AI capabilities into customer support solutions. This aligns strongly with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer, particularly in applying and enhancing generative AI for user-facing applications.
